Files with lyrics containing search query
Lyrics of all selected files will be erased. Continue?

Seventh Lyrics Manager is free opensource application that allows you to automagically download and write song lyrics into ID3v2 tag that included by the most of MP3 files. There is a lot of music players which are able to show song's lyric while playing it. 
 Developed by Miles Seventh, 2016
 
 DISCLAIMER
 Seventh Lyrics Manager is provided by Miles Seventh "as is" and "with all faults". Developer makes no representations or warranties of any kind concerning the safety, suitability, lack of viruses, inaccuracies, typographical errors, or other harmful components of this software. You are solely responsible for the protection of your equipment and backup of your data, and the Developer will not be liable for any damages you may suffer in connection with using, modifying, or distributing this software.
 
 THIRD PARTY COMPONENTS
 Application uses http://lyrics.wikia.com to fetch lyrics and mp3agic library (https://github.com/mpatric/mp3agic) to access ID3V2 tag.
 
 CONTACTS
 http://github.com/MilesVII/slm_gui
 milesseventh@gmail.com
Selection is too big to show. Continuing can overload CPU for some time
Show track\'s name instead of filename (Affects speed!)
Amount of files that can be processed with normal UI (Large queues can seriously affect speed)

Seems like the version of your system is Android 4.4. The problem is that application cannot write to your sdcard without modification of some system files. This operation is harmless and doesn\'t affect system\'s stability. Without it, application will not be allowed to write data into files, but other functions will still be working. Continue and modify system files\?
Done! Reboot your device to apply changes.
Changes weren\'t applied. At least, we tried.
Please, check out files that application can access using main menu
